mapper.select: SELECT M.NO ,M.NAME ,A.MEMBER_NO ,A.STATUS ,A.WORK_DAY ,TO_CHAR(A."START", 'HH24:MI') AS "START" ,TO_CHAR(A."END", 'HH24:MI') AS "END" ,A.WORK_TIME FROM MEMBER M , ATTENDANCE A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND M.NAME = #{name} ORDER BY "WORK_DAY" DESC, "START" DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M , ATTENDANCE A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND M.NAME = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE ( "NO", "MEMBER_NO", STATUS, "WORK_DAY", "START", "END", "WORK_TIME" ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTENDANCE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{no}, 1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR("START", 'HH24:MI') AS "START" ,TO_CHAR("END", 'HH24:MI') AS "END" FROM (SELECT "START","END" FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE "WORK_DAY" = #{workDay} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY "START") WHERE ROWNUM=1
